question: How often do you play games?
How long do you usually play each game?
When do you mainly play games?
What kind of device do you usually use to play games?
What is your favorite type of game?
Which of the following role-playing game elements appeals to you most?
Do you pay more attention to action games?
What do you think is the most important thing in a strategy game?
What do you prefer about shooting games?
To what extent does the picture quality of the game influence your game selection?
What do you think is the impact of sound on the game experience?
Does the difficulty of the game affect your willingness to play?
options: Yes, if it's too hard, don't play
Not really. Difficulty is not the point

question: Do you prefer single player or multiplayer?
options: Multiplayer games, enjoy interacting with others

question: What do you care about most in multiplayer games?
Are you willing to pay for the game?
options: Willing, frequent purchase of premium games or in-app purchases
Not really, but might consider it

question: If your game has a paid option, which option would you prefer?
options: Purchase the game itself in one time
In-game purchases of items or virtual currency

question: What is the maximum amount you can accept for a single in-game purchase?
What do you think is a reasonable price range for paid games?
Do you try a new game because a friend recommends it?
Will you make new friends in the game?
Do you join social groups or forums related to the game?
What is your main way of communicating with other players in the game?
How much does the story appeal to you?
options: Very large, is the main attraction factor
It is relatively large and will affect the game experience
It doesn't matter, I don't pay much attention

question: What kind of game story do you prefer?
How important is the game's worldview setting to you?
options: Vital, affecting the immersion of the game
More important, increase the charm of the game

question: Do you dig into background information because of the game's story and worldview?
How often do you expect your game to update?
options: Update from time to time, but with significant content

question: Do you pay more attention to the updated content of the game?
What is your attitude when there is a BUG in the game?
options: Very dissatisfied, affecting the game experience
Some dissatisfaction, hope to repair as soon as possible

question: How satisfied are you with the after-sales service of game developers?
Do you care about rankings and competitive scores in your game?
options: Very concerned, striving for A high ranking
More concerned, will do his best

question: Do you think the competition in the game is fair?
For the top ranked players, do you think they mainly rely on?
Do you feel anxious because of ranking pressure?
Do you choose a new game because of a particular brand?
What is your main source of game information?
How much are you looking forward to new games from well-known game companies?
How much influence does word of mouth have on your purchase decision?
options: Big, bad reputation do not play
In general, use your own judgment

question: Do you think games are educational?
Which of the following educational elements in games do you find most valuable?
Do you choose games with educational features for your children to play?
Do you think game developers should consider education when designing games?
options: It can be considered, but it is not the focus
It doesn't matter, entertainment is the main thing
Should not affect the fun of the game

question: Do you think games can be considered an art form?
How does the art style in the game appeal to you?
Will you be impressed by the game's music?
Do you think the cultural elements (traditional culture, foreign culture) in games enrich the content of games?
options: It has a certain enriching effect

question: Do you think that playing video games for a long time will affect your health?
options: Definitely, need to control the time
Maybe. Just take care to rest
Not really. I can handle it myself

question: Do you cut back on playing because you're worried about your health?
Do you think game manufacturers should take measures to remind players of their health?
Do you know some ways to relieve game fatigue?
options: Know something about it and use it occasionally

question: How often do you think advertisements should appear?
options: It appears rarely and at long intervals
Appear moderately, do not affect the game progress

question: Does in-game advertising influence your purchase decision?
options: Have some influence, may be concerned
Less influence, do not care too much

question: Do you uninstall your game because of ads in your game?
options: Not really, as long as the game is fun

question: Do you like games with difficult challenges?
options: I like it very much and have A sense of accomplishment
Don't like it, get frustrated too easily

question: How do you think the difficulty of a game should change over time?
options: First easy, then difficult, and then appropriate reduction

question: When you encounter a difficult level in the game, do you?
options: Try again and again until you pass
Give up for now and try again later

question: Do you think hints and guidance in the game are helpful in solving difficult problems?
options: Some help, but can not rely on
Not much help, it's better to explore on your own

question: Do you care about the appearance customization of characters in your game?
options: More concerned, hope to have a certain choice
Not too concerned, not too affect the game

question: What do you prefer about character customization?
How much do you think character customization improves the game experience?
options: Large, increase the sense of substitution

question: Would you give up on a game because the character customization isn't rich enough?
options: Not really. Other factors are more important

question: Do you team up with other players in the game?
options: Occasionally, depending on the task requirements
Rarely, it's more free to play by yourself

question: Do you think the friend system in the game is convenient and practical?
options: Very convenient and easy to use
More convenient, can meet the demand
In general, there is room for improvement
It is inconvenient and difficult to use

question: Will you join a guild or society in the game?
options: Maybe, depending on the guild atmosphere
Not really. I find it troublesome

question: What do you focus on most when interacting with other players in your game?
How difficult do you think currency acquisition is in the game?
options: Very easy, no shortage of currency
It's easier and can meet the needs
It is difficult and requires effort

question: Are the items in the game reasonably priced?
options: It's not reasonable. It's a little expensive

question: What do you think of the trading system in the game (trading between players)?
options: It is necessary to promote communication
It has a certain role, but it should be regulated
The effect is not large, easy to cause problems

question: Will you be investing in the game (buying property, shops, etc.)?
options: Maybe, depending on the rate of return

question: Do you like having story options in your game?
options: Very like, increase the sense of substitution
Don't like it, it's too complicated

question: Do you think story choices have a big impact on replayability?
options: Very large, different choices each time

question: What is your main basis for choosing a story?
Are you replaying the game because a story choice leads to a bad ending?
options: Yes, it has to end well

question: How do you feel about designing multiple endings in games?
options: It was wonderful and enriched the experience
In general, I don't feel much
